vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at 1Ch.2.18;
son of: Caleb (H3612H) and Jerioth(?) (H3408);
brother of: Hur (H2354), Shobab (H7727H), Ardon (H0715), Mareshah@1Ch.2.42 (H4337), Haran (H2771B), Moza (H4162), Gazez (H1495), Jahdai (H3056), Sheber (H7669), Tirhanah (H8647), Shaaph (H8174H), Sheva (H7724) and Achsah (H5915H)
§ Jesher = "upright"
one of the sons of Caleb and grandson of Hezron by wife Azubah
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Caleb; tribu de Judá
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
耶設 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "正直"
希斯崙的兒子迦勒和阿蘇巴所生的兒子之一 (代上2:18)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
耶设 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "正直"
希斯仑的儿子迦勒和阿苏巴所生的儿子之一 (代上2:18)
